IndexPage.title: SoraWeb
IndexPage.description: SoraWebui is an open-source platform enabling users to easily create videos from text with OpenAI's Sora model.Sora文本生成视频AI
IndexPage.pDescription: SoraWebui is an open-source project that simplifies video creation by allowing users to generate videos online with OpenAI's Sora model using text, featuring easy one-click website deployment.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service ｜ SoraWebui
termsOfService.mainDescription: SoraWebui is an open-source platform enabling users to easily create videos from text with OpenAI's Sora model.
termsOfService.desc: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of SoraWebui (the "Service"), provided by SoraWebui ("we" or "us"). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
termsOfService.h4_1_p: SoraWebui provides a browser interface for OpenAI Sora, allowing users to generate text-to-video easily.
termsOfService.h4_2_p: The ownership of the video generated from the text belongs to the original user.
termsOfService.h4_3_p: We collect and store user data including name, email, and payment information. We handle this data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
termsOfService.h4_4_p: We use web cookies to collect non-personal data. For more information, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
termsOfService.h4_5_p: Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information about you. By using our Service, you agree to our Privacy Policy, which can be found at
termsOfService.h4_6_p: These Terms are governed by the laws of the United States of America.
termsOfService.h4_7_p: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify users of any material changes via email.
termsOfService.h4_8_p: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at
